name: Only Sell All But One (Sapherna)
description: Small snip of code to get rid of the "Sell All" button for the Forest game on Sapherna, so you don't accidentally click it.

user.name: Jitaroo
user.about: Hi, I'm Jitaroo, I write codes for various sites out of personal interest. Not a serious coder when it comes to these styles but I hope you like anything I happen to produce. :3 Donations are greatly appreciated.

additional_info: Disclaimer: Will not be held responsible for a slip of a finger when you're on a different device which doesn't use Stylish. ;p
